name: Bobs Adventure Island 2
description:
This was/is for the GMTK gamejam! You play as the little tank that could: BOB! Kill the evil squares by boosting over them by pressing "space/leftshift" while avoiding the water as much as possible!

Credits:

Music: Kayne Tortellini

Testing/Concept: Jorre van Merrienboer

All the other things: Harm Meyer (me)
